title: How to write a letter to a school asking for a chance in my studies - Quora

response.answer_text: The letter must be formal, and addressed to the correct people - by chance do you mean that you want to enrol, or do you mean that you are not doing as well as you had hoped with your studies and you want an extension to a deadline? Each of these would be addressed to different departments. Choose the correct destination.Give reasons why your request should be considered. (Make notes before you write, try to be as logical as possible).Avoid emotion and heart-tugging stories, the person you are writing to has had plenty of those!
